# VZUSBMassStorageDevice

**Class**

A class that represents a hot-pluggable USB mass storage device.

## Declaration

```swift
class VZUSBMassStorageDevice
```

## Overview

Create this device either by instantiating it directly and passing [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZUSBMassStorageDeviceConfiguration] to its initializer, or instantiating a `VZUSBMassStorageDeviceConfiguration` in a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtualMachineConfiguration]. Direct instantiation creates an object that you can pass to [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZUSBController/attach(device:completionHandler:)]. Instantiation through `VZUSBMassStorageDeviceConfiguration` makes the device available in the [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZUSBController/usbDevices] property.

## Creating a USB mass storage device

- **init(configuration:)**: Creates a USB mass storage device with the provided configuration.

## Related Documentation

- **VZUSBController**: A class that represents a USB controller in a VM.

## Inherits From

- VZStorageDevice

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- VZUSBDevice
